metadata.title: CVE-2019-13072 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Stored XSS in the Filters page (Name field) in ZoneMinder 1.32.3 allows a malicious user to embed and execute JavaScript code in the browser of any user who navigates to this page. msalvatore> Based on the commit that resolves this, it's likely a duplicate of CVE-2019-7344.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
